00039 #ifndef LIBCURIE_SIGNAL_H
00040 #define LIBCURIE_SIGNAL_H
00041 
00042 #include <curie/multiplex.h>
00043 
00044 #define SIGNAL_MAX_NUM sig_winch
00045 
00046 enum signal {
00047     sig_unused = 0,
00048 
00049     /*  posix.1-1990 */
00050     sig_hup = 1,     /* terminal hangup/controlling process died */
00051     sig_int = 2,     /* interrupt */
00052     sig_quit = 3,    /* quit */
00053     sig_ill = 4,     /* illegal instruction */
00054     sig_abrt = 5,    /* abort */
00055     sig_fpe = 6,     /* floating point exception */
00056     sig_kill = 7,    /* kill */
00057     sig_segv = 8,    /* segmentation violation */
00058     sig_pipe = 9,    /* broken pipe */
00059     sig_alrm = 10,   /* timer */
00060     sig_term = 11,   /* termination request */
00061     sig_chld = 12,   /* child stopped/terminated */
00062     sig_cont = 13,   /* continue */
00063     sig_stop = 14,   /* stop */
00064     sig_tstp = 15,   /* stop from tty */
00065     sig_ttin = 16,   /* tty input (background process) */
00066     sig_ttou = 17,   /* tty output (background process) */
00067 
00068     sig_usr1 = 18,   /* user-defined signal */
00069     sig_usr2 = 19,   /* user-defined signal */
00070 
00071     /*  posix.1-2001 */
00072     sig_bus = 20,    /* bus error */
00073     sig_poll = 21,   /* pollable event */
00074     sig_prof = 22,   /* profiling timer expired */
00075     sig_sys = 23,    /* bad argument to routine */
00076     sig_trap = 24,   /* trace/breakpoint trap */
00077     sig_urg = 25,    /* urgent condition on socket */
00078     sig_vtalrm = 26, /* virtual alarm clock */
00079     sig_xcpu = 27,   /* cpu time limit exceeded */
00080     sig_xfsz = 28,   /* file size limit exceeded */
00081 
00082     /* random (i've seen these on linux) */
00083     sig_iot = 29,    /* IOT trap */
00084     sig_emt = 30,    /* ? */
00085     sig_stkflt = 31, /* stack fault on coprocessor */
00086     sig_io = 32,     /* I/O possible */
00087     sig_pwr = 33,    /* power failure */
00088     sig_info = 34,   /* power status information ? */
00089     sig_lost = 35,   /* file lock lost */
00090     sig_winch = 36   /* window resize */
00091 };
00092 
00093 enum signal_callback_result {
00094     scr_keep = 0,
00095     scr_ditch = 1
00096 };
00097 
00098 void multiplex_signal ();
00099 void multiplex_add_signal (enum signal signal, enum signal_callback_result (*handler)(enum signal, void *), void *data);
00100 
00101 void send_signal (enum signal signal, int pid);
00102 void send_signal_self (enum signal signal);
00103 
00104 #endif
